member.name: Amy Morrisson
member.title: Real Estate Agent
member.summary: Amy has been in the real estate business for more than 16 years and has handled a variety of transactions over her career. Her clients admire her passion and enthusiasm, and credit her for putting together smooth, trouble-free transactions for both buyers and sellers. Amy recently completed a 30 hour course in advanced real estate sales and also received her certification as a Senior Real Estate Specialist.
